codeSystems.name: IHE_FormatCode_vs
codeSystems.title: IHE ValueSet of Format Codes for use with Document Sharing
codeSystems.description: The IHE FormatCode Value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by IHE, DICOM and HL7. These codes are intended to be preferred.

codeSystems.name: DSUBmPublishBundleActions
codeSystems.title: DSUBm Update to document sharing resources actions ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-111 Resource Publish for the Folder List type and the DocumentReference resources.

codeSystems.name: DSUBmlistTypesVS
codeSystems.title: DSUBm List Types ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the DSUBm List Types allowed

codeSystems.name: DocumentReferenceStats
codeSystems.title: DSUBm DocumentReference status codes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that does not include entered-in-error as that does not map

codeSystems.name: DSUBmPayload
codeSystems.title: DSUBm payload admitted Value Set
codeSystems.description: Codes to represent the admitted payload MIME type chosen when creating subscription
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-DSUBm-DocumentRefere: Subscription for DocumentReference Multi-Patient with DocumentReference Subscription for Full Events Option
Subscription for DocumentReference Patient-Dependent with DocumentReference Subscription for Minimal Update Option
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-DSUBm-Folder-Subscri: Subscription for Folder Patient-Dependent with Folder Subscription for Update Option
Subscription for Folder Patient-Dependent with Folder Subscription for Full Events Option
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-DSUBm-Basic-Folder-S: Subscription for Folder Patient-Dependent with Basic Folder Subscription Option
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-DSUBm-Folder-Subscri: Subscription for Folder Patient-Dependent with Folder Subscription for Minimal Update Option
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-DSUBm-DocumentRefere: Subscription for DocumentReference Multi-Patient with DocumentReference Subscription for Minimal Update Option
Subscription for DocumentReference Patient-Dependent with DocumentReference Subscription for Full Events Option

codeSystems.name: MHDprovidePatientActions
codeSystems.title: MHD Patient Types ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-65 Provide Document Bundle for the Patient type Resource. Where Patient would typically be indicated as a GET (read), but might be created or updated depending on policy.
